item.title: Smartphone DASH7 and NFC communication using an NFC antenna
item.description: In this post we explain a proof of concept which demonstrate that DASH7 can be integrated into a smarthpone, by making use of an NFC antenna, and thus in a space efficient way.
item.dc:creator: Glenn Ergeerts

item.title: DASH7 Alliance Protocol v1.0
item.description: Version 1.0 of the DASH7 Alliance Protocol has been voted by the alliance members during the Spring Meeting in Berlin last week. In this post we will shed some light on the current status and planning of v1.0 support in OSS-7.
item.dc:creator: Glenn Ergeerts

item.title: Live capturing of DASH7 traffic in wireshark
item.description: This post explains how to configure wireshark so it can be used capture live DASH7 traffic using a OSS-7 powered node.
item.dc:creator: Glenn Ergeerts

item.title: How to analyze DASH7 traffic in wireshark
item.description: This post explains how to configure wireshark so it can be used to analyze DASH7 traffic captured using a OSS-7 powered node.
item.dc:creator: Glenn Ergeerts

item.title: Welcome to our new site!
item.description: On this site you will find all information to get started with OSS-7!
item.dc:creator: Glenn Ergeerts
